inclusion.criterion: NYHA-class II or greater, angina pectoris, or syncope
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: technical and anatomical eligible for interventions
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Native aortic annulus size < 20 mm or > 29 mm per the baseline diagnostic imaging
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has symptomatic severe aortic stenosis, is technically and anatomically eligible for interventions, but has native aortic annulus size that may be outside the inclusion criteria.
